DOC.brief_summary: We evaluate effect two week intensive supervised physical activity serum fibroblast growth factor 21 ( FGF21 ) level .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Serum Fibroblast Growth Factor 21 ( FGF21 ) Levels Correlated With Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Comparative longitudinal study . Anthropometric biochemical evaluation do , 1hr 4hr bout exercise repeat two week daily supervise exercise . We study sedentary young healthy woman . A treadmill exercise test ( follow Bruce 's protocol ) do five time per week ( Monday Friday ) two week . The Department Endocrinology Metabolism INCMNSZ perform biochemical laboratory measurement use standardized procedure .
DOC.criteria: Women Aged 18 35 year old , Body mass index ( BMI ) < 30 kg/m2 Without contraindication exercise Metabolic syndrome Diabetes Dyslipidemia Hypertension Asthma Thyroid disease Treated fibrates , beta agonist blocker History current arrhythmia , murmur , cardiomegaly , treatment cardiovascular disease Contraindications exercise testing also consider exclusion criterion ( see reference )
